statements: DELETE FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE alert_message = 'Unauthorized Access Detected';
DELETE FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE id = 1 AND device_id = 100
DELETE FROM iot_security_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND is_processed = FALSE
DELETE FROM security_alerts WHERE device_id = 123 AND alert_type = 'intrusion';
DELETE FROM security_alerts WHERE id = 100 AND device_id = 50;
DELETE FROM security_logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR' AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM triggers WHERE trigger_description LIKE '%critical%' AND trigger_name = 'MyTrigger';
DELETE FROM Team_assignments WHERE team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM Security_teams WHERE team_lead = 'Alice');
